1550670.name: Medievalien Original Soundtrack
1550670.description:
The Medievalien Soundtrack contains state of the art mixed and mastered soundtracks used during the game.

All tracks feature a unique blend of orchestral music and synth / new wave style music, to symbolize the clash between the medieval world and the alien technology you experience during the game.

All tracks have been produced and composed by New Zaeland based composer Sai Natarajan.
